        searchCriteria - all information regarding the request parameters

        Gets a product, uniquely identified by a locale and a slug
        Parameters:

        slug - the slug

      • getSuggestions

        play.libs.F.Promise<java.util.List<io.sphere.sdk.products.ProductProjection>> getSuggestions(io.sphere.sdk.products.ProductProjection product,
                                                                                             CategoryTreeExtended categoryTree,
                                                                                             int numSuggestions)
        Gets a List of length numSuggestions of Products related somehow with the given product.
        Parameters:
        product - the product to get suggestions for
        numSuggestions - the number of products the returned list should contain. It might contain less if the requested number is greater than the number of available products.
        Returns:
        A Promise of the list of products without duplicates

      • getSuggestions

        play.libs.F.Promise<java.util.List<io.sphere.sdk.products.ProductProjection>> getSuggestions(java.util.List<io.sphere.sdk.categories.Category> categories,
                                                                                             int numSuggestions)
        Gets a List of length numSuggestions of Products from the given categories
        Parameters:
        categories - the categories to get suggestions from
        numSuggestions - the number of products the returned list should contain. It might contain less if the requested number is greater than the number of available products.
        Returns:
        A Promise of the list of products without duplicates
